title: ‘Loyalty should be a two way street’: Marjorie Taylor Greene nods to rift with Trump in resignation letter – US politics live
summary: Greene announced her departure from the Republican party in a video and statement on X, expressing her discontent with the party establishment. She criticized the leadership for not aligning with her values and concerns. The announcement marks a significant shift in her political alignment.

title: From staunch Trump ally to ‘traitor’: key takeaways of Marjorie Taylor Greene’s career
summary: A Georgia representative announced her resignation from office, effective January 2026. The decision was made public on Friday. Further details regarding her reasons for stepping down were not disclosed.

title: Australia v England: Ashes first Test, day two – live
summary: In the series opener in Perth, the tourists have established a 40-run lead heading into their second innings. The action continues as writers provide live updates on the match. Fans are invited to follow the developments closely.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene to resign from Congress in January
summary: A prominent Georgia Republican and key figure in the MAGA movement has announced the decision to relinquish their House seat following a significant rift with Donald Trump. This move signals a notable shift in political allegiances and dynamics within the party. The decision underscores the ongoing tensions between certain factions of the GOP and Trump’s influence.

title: Trump news at a glance: president meets Mamdani at White House and it was … nice?
summary: In a recent meeting, Trump expressed strong confidence in Mamdani's capabilities, stating he believes he can perform well in his role. The interaction was notably cordial, highlighting a positive tone between Trump and the press. This marks a departure from the often contentious relationship he has had with media representatives.
